name: Apple Studio Display
description: 27-inch 5K Retina display with 600 nits brightness and P3 wide color. Features A13 Bionic chip, Center Stage camera, and six-speaker system. The Mac companion display.

reviews.review_text: 5K Retina is gorgeous. Text rendering is perfect.
Center Stage is surprisingly useful for calls.
Expensive for specs but macOS integration is seamless.
